# Termify

> Termify is a 100% free professional English learning app with 4,230+ terms for Aviation, Maritime, Logistics, Finance, Cybersecurity and IT/DevOps. All terminology sourced from official ICAO, IMO, ISO 27001, NIST and ITIL standards. iOS only. Developer: BipBoo Corporation.

Termify teaches industry-specific English terminology used by pilots, seafarers, freight forwarders, traders, SOC analysts and DevOps engineers. Every feature is free — no subscriptions, no hidden fees, no credit card required. The app includes native pronunciation with IPA transcriptions, real-world dialogue scenarios, adaptive spaced repetition, career quizzes with shareable PDF certificates, an AI learning assistant and full offline mode. Available in 23 interface languages. Trusted by 50,000+ professionals in 120+ countries.

- App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/professional-english-termify/id6744872522
- App Store ID: 6744872522
- Current Version: 1.0.12
- Price: Free (no subscription, no credit card, no hidden fees)
- Platform: iOS (iPhone, iPad, Mac with Apple Silicon, Apple Vision Pro)
- Support: support@protermify.com

## Docs

- [Home](https://protermify.com/): Product overview, 6 industry modules, key features, download links, FAQ
- [Aviation English](https://protermify.com/pages/aviation-english.html): ICAO Doc 9432 phraseology, pilot-ATC radiotelephony, ICAO Level 4/5/6 exam preparation
- [Maritime English](https://protermify.com/pages/maritime-english.html): IMO SMCP, bridge communication, STCW English, Marlins Test preparation
- [Logistics English](https://protermify.com/pages/logistics-english.html): Incoterms 2020 (all 11 rules), supply chain KPIs, freight forwarding, FIATA/CILT preparation
- [Finance English](https://protermify.com/pages/finance-english.html): Trading terminology, corporate banking, CFA/ACCA/FRM exam preparation
- [Cybersecurity English](https://protermify.com/pages/cybersecurity-english.html): MITRE ATT&CK, SOC workflows, ISO 27001, CISSP/CompTIA Security+ preparation
- [IT/DevOps English](https://protermify.com/pages/it-devops-english.html): Cloud architecture, CI/CD, ITIL v4, AWS/Azure/Kubernetes CKA preparation
- [App Comparison](https://protermify.com/pages/compare.html): Termify vs PeakTalk vs Duolingo vs Babbel — feature-by-feature comparison
